#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
long a[1000];
int main()
{
long t,n,i,max,j,diff,res;
scanf("%ld",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%ld",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%ld",&a[i]);
diff=a[1]-a[0];
for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
{
for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
{
res=a[j]-a[i];
if(res>diff)
diff=res;
}
}
printf("%ld\n",diff);
}
return 0;
}
